title: Event Reservation System
description: Comprehensive event booking platform with client management, role-based permissions, service area definition (interactive map), payment processing, and automated document generation.
challenges: Implementation of complex role-based permission system with secure payment processing and integration with interactive map for service area definition.
outcome: Significantly increased efficiency in booking management and improved customer service workflow with automated notifications.

sections.title: Complete Booking Platform
sections.content: This project involved creating a comprehensive booking platform that handles multiple types of users, each with different permissions and workflows. The system manages everything from initial booking to payment processing and final service delivery.

sections.title: Advanced Features
sections.content: Key features include role-based access control with custom role creation, two-factor authentication, payment processing system, automated receipt and voucher generation, interactive map integration for service area definition, and comprehensive client/employee management with robust mailing notifications.

sections.title: Technical Excellence
sections.content: Built with Laravel for robust backend functionality, integrated with MySQL for reliable data management, and featuring a responsive interface built with BulmaCSS. The system includes secure payment gateways and automated email notifications for all user roles.

title: Corporate Service Platform
description: Enterprise service booking system with domain-based access control. Companies register their email domains, enabling automatic employee access to services when administrators create availability slots.
challenges: Creating a secure domain verification system and managing complex multi-tenant scheduling where admins control availability and employees can book automatically.
outcome: Streamlined service booking process in corporate environments with automated domain-based access control and increased employee satisfaction rates.

sections.title: Domain-Based Access Control
sections.content: Developed an enterprise platform with innovative domain-based access control. Companies register their email domains, which get automatically whitelisted, allowing their employees to access the booking system seamlessly without individual registration.

sections.title: Admin-Employee Workflow
sections.content: The system features a two-tier booking model where company administrators create availability slots and manage scheduling, while employees can automatically book available services using their corporate email addresses. Features include robust mailing system for automated notifications to all user roles and comprehensive reporting dashboards.

sections.title: Bulletproof & Time-Proof Architecture
sections.content: Built on Laravel and MySQL - proven, battle-tested technologies that ensure long-term stability and reliability. This technology stack provides bulletproof performance and time-proof architecture that can handle growing business needs while maintaining security and scalability for years to come.

sections.title: Why I Love Web Scraping
sections.content: Web scraping is one of the things I enjoy the most. It's a field that requires much more thinking and researching than just writing code. While optimization and data structure are important, the real challenge lies in understanding the target, adapting to changes, and ensuring reliability.

sections.title: Production-Ready Solutions
sections.content: I have created a handful of production-ready, reliable web scrapers for various domains, including real estate, marketing, and lead collection. These solutions are designed to run smoothly and require minimal maintenance.

sections.title: Tools & Technologies
sections.content: My primary tool is Selenium, but I am also proficient with Playwright and Splash Scrapy. I always focus on making my scrapers robust, efficient, and resistant to changes in website structure or anti-bot measures.
